alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 15 at 9:36AM AKDT until October 16 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow and freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight AKDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Chance for freezing rain this morning, then changing to snow along with strong winds could produce low visibility at times through this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
